item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

27. Free-form floor plan design using differentiable Voronoi diagram (229 points | 58 comments)

29. EzAudio: Enhancing Text-to-Audio Generation with Efficient Diffusion Transformer (73 points | 10 comments)
